forecast.name: Overnight

forecast.name: Veterans Day
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Slight Chance Light Snow
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow after 1pm. Mostly cloudy. High near 40, with temperatures falling to around 36 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 9 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tuesday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow before 10pm, then a chance of freezing rain between 10pm and 11pm, then a chance of snow between 11pm and 4am, then a slight chance of rain and snow. Cloudy. Low around 30, with temperatures rising to around 34 overnight. Southwest wind 8 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 31 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.
